textBox.richText: Foolishly before we left we thought it would be wise to grab a wad of Euros to limit our need for trips to the ATM. Not a particularly wise move obtaining this cash in a single 500 Euro note. My question is why make a note that nobody accepts... the majority of stores, shops and hotels limit themselves to denominations of 50 Euros and below! Anyway minus that gripe we absolutely loved Bordeaux. A typical example of French ingenuity coupled with exciting ancient history. We are now on our way down to Bayonne, Biarritz and St-Jean-de-Luz to hang out on the beach and make the most of this fantastic weather - no doubt it will probably rain! :)
